sections.heading: retirement system; legal advisor
sections.text: The board may contract for the services of a legal advisor to the board of trustees until September 1, 2024. Beginning September 1, 2024, the attorney hired by the retirement board pursuant to section 84-1503 shall also advise such board regarding the administration

79-985.Employees retirement system; legal advisor.

The board may contract for the services of a legal advisor to the board of trustees until September 1, 2024. Beginning September 1, 2024, the attorney hired by the retirement board pursuant to section 84-1503 shall also advise such board regarding the administration of the retirement system.

SourceLaws 1951, c. 274, § 8, p. 915;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-1039;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 620;Laws 2006, LB 1024, § 65;Laws 2016, LB447, § 24;Laws 2021, LB147, § 19.
